title: Favorites Feature Upgrades
author: Agustin Benitez
contenido1: Additional settings have been added to position the Favorites bar at the bottom of the screen.
contenido2: You can now create folders within Favorites and easily drag items into folders or move them back out

title: Initial stable release
author: Agustin Benitez
contenido1: Built-in Clock: Check the time effortlessly without distractions.
contenido2: Notes Management: Easily create, edit, and delete notes.
contenido3: Export Notes: Export your notes to a .txt file for easy storage and access later.
contenido4: Customizable Background: Choose between a static or animated background to personalize your homepage.
contenido5: Simplified Interface: The notes menu only appears when needed, keeping your workspace clean and organized.
contenido6: Customizable Font: Change the font of your notes to match your personal style.
contenido7: Language Options: Customize the interface language with 8 options: English, Spanish, Valencian, French, Russian, Chinese, Japanese, and Korean.
contenido8: User-Friendly Design: Notes with highlighted borders and a light purple background offer a visually appealing yet functional experience without cluttering the page.
